EmailTemplate.subject: Are Employees Stealing From You?
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Four Ways to Outsmart a Scammer Using Your Restaurant POS System - Don’t allow the transfer of checks and or server-to-server ticket transfers - Never void an item off a check once the menu item is prepared - Review any check from your mobile phone - Leverage technology to track inventory Combat the six types of employee scams <[[https://www.ncr.com/blogs/restaurants/combat-employee-scams-with-pos]]>. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
